title: The Grounds of Living Compassion
description: 2009-09-02 - A critical question on the spiritual path is how we can bring the loving presence awakened by meditation into every facet of daily life. This talk explores the conditioning that keeps us in reactive trance and the ways we can deepen our attention and align our lives with our hearts.  Please support this podcast by donating at www.tarabrach.com or www.imcw.org. Thank you!
